comments:

There are a few problems here:
#1) old launch configurations (build 20020321) should be compatible with M5
#2) if the files are corrupted or something, only one error dialog should 
appear, not seven (I only have 3 configurations! Why 7 errors?)
#3) the error dialog doesn't offer to fix (e.g. delete?) the broken files, nor 
does it offer any suggestions on how to fix the problem.  I had to figure out 
where the files are stored and delete them myself.
#4) the error message doesn't tell me which file is corrupt

PDE changed its plug-in structure and launch config type identifiers. There was 
a message about this to eclipse-dev. You need to manually fix your .launch 
files in your meta-data, or delete and re-create them.

What type of launch configs do you have? (Please note that there was no 
guarentee on compatibility before M5. We guarentee compatibility from M5 
forward).

We have a bug report about the annoying dialogs (bug# 13292).

Closing, unless there is an issue with non-PDE launch configs. (Noting that 
bug# 13292 is to be addressed).
